content: The tax system breakdown for #Endgame is designed to be fair and transparent for all users. The system includes a flat fee for all transactions, as well as a percentage-based fee for larger transactions. The flat fee is used to cover the costs of network fees and other expenses, while the percentage-based fee is used to fund the treasury and ensure sustainable growth for the project. Additionally, the tax system may include a referral fee for users who choose to participate in the referral system, which rewards users for bringing new members to the community. Overall, the tax system is designed to balance the needs of the community and the project, ensuring that everyone benefits from the success of #Endgame.
